title: Under The Orange Moon
description: The forest holds secrets that nobody knew about until now. Four individuals will have their lives changed forever over the course of a few days.  The key event that takes place under the orange moon is a unique moment, never to be repeated on this world again.  Lives will intertwine, pasts will be righted and people will die.The secrets of the forest will be unleashed upon the world and this is only the beginning...
author: Breccan Smith
